meanings.definition: Covered with too many plaid patterns.
meanings.sent1: The room looked overplaided with all the different plaid blankets and curtains.
meanings.sent2: She felt embarrassed wearing the overplaided outfit to the party.
meanings.sent3: The overplaided sofa clashed with the striped rug in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: His overplaided backpack made him stand out like a colorful patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent5: The overplaided walls of the restaurant made it feel cozy and warm.

meanings.definition: Wearing an excessive amount of plaid.
meanings.sent1: The overplaided shirt he wore was a mix of red, green, and blue.
meanings.sent2: She received compliments on her overplaided scarf at the winter market.
meanings.sent3: He looked like a walking picnic in his overplaided pants and jacket.
meanings.sent4: Her overplaided hat was a beacon of color in the gray city streets.
meanings.sent5: The overplaided coat kept her warm and stylish during the cold spell.

meanings.sent1: The overplaided room had plaid wallpaper, plaid furniture, and even plaid curtains.
meanings.sent2: He found the overplaided car interior to be a bit overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The overplaided phone case was a quirky fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: Her overplaided laptop cover was a burst of color in the office.
meanings.sent5: The overplaided picnic basket was a cheerful addition to the outdoor gathering.
